zh-cn: 艾曼纽·尚-米歇尔·弗雷德里克·马克宏

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，现任法国总统和安道尔大公。曾任法国经济、产业更新和信息技术部长。他于2016年成立“共和国前进！”政党，并在2017年和2022年连续两次赢得总统选举。
description.en: French politician, the current President of France and Co-Prince of Andorra. He previously served as Minister of the Economy, Industry and Digital Affairs. He founded the political party La République En Marche! in 2016 and won the presidential elections in both 2017 and 2022.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The position of the head of state of the French Republic.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙的前任法国总统。
description.en: French politician, predecessor to Emmanuel Macron as President of France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，曾在其总理任内任命埃马纽埃尔·马克龙为经济部长。
description.en: French politician who, as Prime Minister, appointed Emmanuel Macron as Minister of Economy.

zh-cn: 经济产业更新和信息技术部
en: Ministry of the Economy and Finance (France)

description.zh-cn: 法国政府部门之一，负责制定和实施国家的经济、金融、财政和税务政策。
description.en: A ministry of the Government of France, responsible for the nation's economic, financial, fiscal, and tax policy.

description.zh-cn: 由埃马纽埃尔·马克龙于2016年4月创立的法国政党。
description.en: A French political party founded in April 2016 by Emmanuel Macron.

description.zh-cn: 2017年举行的法国总统选举，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙在该次选举中首次当选总统。
description.en: The 2017 presidential election in France, in which Emmanuel Macron was first elected president.

zh-cn: 布丽吉特·玛丽-克洛德·托涅

description.zh-cn: 埃马纽埃尔·马克龙的妻子，曾是他在高中时期的老师。
description.en: The wife of Emmanuel Macron, who was formerly his high school teacher.

description.zh-cn: 法国的一个社会民主主义政党，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙曾是其党员。
description.en: A social-democratic political party in France, of which Emmanuel Macron was a former member.

description.zh-cn: 2022年举行的法国总统选举，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙在该次选举中成功连任。
description.en: The 2022 presidential election in France, in which Emmanuel Macron won re-election.

description.zh-cn: 法国北部城市，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙的出生地。
description.en: A city in northern France, the birthplace of Emmanuel Macron.

description.zh-cn: 位于法国巴黎的公立大学，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙在此获得哲学高等深入研究文凭。
description.en: A public university in Paris, France, where Emmanuel Macron obtained a DEA degree in Philosophy.

description.zh-cn: 法国著名的高等教育机构，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙在此获得公共行政硕士学位。
description.en: A prestigious higher education institution in France, where Emmanuel Macron obtained a Master's degree in Public Administration.

description.zh-cn: 法国培养高级公务员的顶尖学府，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙在此获得高级公务员资格。
description.en: A top French graduate school for senior civil servants, from which Emmanuel Macron graduated.

description.zh-cn: 法国哲学家，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙曾担任其助理。
description.en: A French philosopher for whom Emmanuel Macron worked as an assistant.

description.zh-cn: 法国经济学家及战略分析家，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙曾在他领导的委员会中担任副书记。
description.en: A French economist and strategic analyst, in whose commission Emmanuel Macron served as a deputy rapporteur.

description.zh-cn: 一家跨国投资银行和金融服务公司，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙曾在此担任投资银行家。
description.en: A multinational investment bank and financial services company where Emmanuel Macron worked as an investment banker.

description.zh-cn: 一场始于2018年11月的抗议运动，最初旨在反对马克龙政府提高燃油税的计划。
description.en: A protest movement that began in November 2018, initially to protest against the Macron government's plan to raise fuel taxes.

zh-cn: 法国教师遭遇极端分子斩首案件

description.zh-cn: 一名法国教师因在课堂上展示穆罕默德漫画而被伊斯兰极端分子斩首的事件。该事件促使马克龙发表强硬的反伊斯兰激进主义言论。
description.en: The beheading of a French teacher by an Islamic extremist for showing cartoons of Muhammad in class. The incident prompted Macron to make strong remarks against Islamic radicalism.

description.zh-cn: 一名在2021年6月公开掌掴法国总统马克龙的男子。
description.en: A man who publicly slapped French President Emmanuel Macron in June 2021.

en: Strategic autonomy for the European Union

description.zh-cn: 欧盟的一项政策目标，旨在增强其独立行动的能力。马克龙是该理念的主要倡导者之一。
description.en: A policy goal of the European Union to enhance its capacity to act autonomously. Macron is one of its main proponents.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发展的马克思列宁主义理论。马克龙曾在采访中自称为“毛泽东主义者”。
description.en: A variant of Marxism–Leninism developed by Mao Zedong. Macron described himself as a 'Maoist' in an interview.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第二代主要领导人，马克龙曾引用其“黑猫白猫论”名言。
description.en: The second paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, whose famous 'black cat, white cat' quote was cited by Macron.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平提出的著名经济理论，强调实用主义。马克龙曾引用此论。
description.en: A famous economic theory emphasizing pragmatism, proposed by Deng Xiaoping. Macron quoted this theory.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 埃马纽埃尔·马克龙于2017年5月14日首次就任法国总统，并于2022年成功连任。
description.en: Emmanuel Macron first took office as President of France on May 14, 2017, and was successfully re-elected in 2022.

position.zh-cn: 经济、产业更新和信息技术部长
position.en: Minister of the Economy, Industry and Digital Affairs

description.zh-cn: 在第二瓦尔斯内阁中，埃马纽埃尔·马克龙被任命为经济、产业更新和信息技术部长。
description.en: In the Second Valls government, Emmanuel Macron was appointed Minister of the Economy, Industry and Digital Affairs.

position.zh-cn: 总统府副秘书长、经济部长
position.en: Deputy Secretary-General of the Presidency, Minister of Economy

description.zh-cn: 在弗朗索瓦·奥朗德担任总统期间，马克龙曾担任总统府副秘书长（2012-2014）和经济部长（2014-2016）。
description.en: During François Hollande's presidency, Macron served as Deputy Secretary-General of the Presidency (2012-2014) and Minister of Economy (2014-2016).

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在总理曼努埃尔·瓦尔斯领导的政府中担任经济部长。
description.en: Macron served as Minister of Economy in the government led by Prime Minister Manuel Valls.

description.zh-cn: 埃马纽埃尔·马克龙于2016年4月6日创立了名为“共和国前进！”的政治运动，该运动后来成为复兴党。
description.en: Emmanuel Macron founded the political movement 'En Marche!' on April 6, 2016, which later became the Renaissance party.

description.zh-cn: 埃马纽埃尔·马克龙曾于2006年至2009年为法国社会党成员。
description.en: Emmanuel Macron was a member of the French Socialist Party from 2006 to 2009.

description.zh-cn: 埃马纽埃尔·马克龙在2017年法国总统选举中获胜，首次当选法国总统。
description.en: Emmanuel Macron won the 2017 French presidential election, becoming the President of France for the first time.

description.zh-cn: 埃马纽埃尔·马克龙在2022年法国总统选举中再次获胜，成功连任。
description.en: Emmanuel Macron won re-election in the 2022 French presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 埃马纽埃尔·马克龙于2007年与比他年长24岁的前高中老师碧姬·托涅结婚。
description.en: Emmanuel Macron married Brigitte Trogneux, his former high school teacher who is 24 years his senior, in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 埃马纽埃尔·马克龙于1977年12月21日出生于法国亚眠。
description.en: Emmanuel Macron was born in Amiens, France, on December 21, 1977.

degree.zh-cn: 高等深入研究文凭 (哲学)

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在巴黎第十大学学习哲学，并获得了高等深入研究文凭（DEA）学位。
description.en: Macron studied philosophy at Paris Nanterre University and obtained a DEA degree.

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在巴黎政治学院获得了公共行政硕士学位。
description.en: Macron obtained a Master's degree in Public Administration from Sciences Po.

description.zh-cn: 马克龙于2004年毕业于国家行政学院，获得高级公务员资格。
description.en: Macron graduated from the École nationale d'administration in 2004, qualifying as a senior civil servant.

description.zh-cn: 2018年11月，民众因不满马克龙政府计划提高燃油税而发起了“黄背心运动”以示抗议。
description.en: In November 2018, the 'Yellow Vests Movement' was launched to protest against the Macron government's plan to increase fuel taxes.

description.zh-cn: 在萨缪尔·帕蒂的国葬仪式上，马克龙发表了强硬讲话，表明法国不会向伊斯兰激进分子退让，引发了穆斯林世界的广泛不满。
description.en: At the national memorial for Samuel Paty, Macron gave a strong speech stating that France would not give in to Islamic radicals, which caused widespread discontent in the Muslim world.

description.zh-cn: 达米安·塔雷尔于2021年6月8日在马克龙视察德龙省时当众掌掴了他。
description.en: Damien Tarel slapped Emmanuel Macron in public on June 8, 2021, during the president's visit to the Drôme department.

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在2023年4月访华后接受采访时，强调欧洲应实现战略自主，成为美中以外的第三极。
description.en: In an interview after his visit to China in April 2023, Macron emphasized that Europe should achieve strategic autonomy and become a third superpower besides the US and China.

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在2017年3月接受《巴黎人报》采访时表示自己是“毛泽东主义者”。
description.en: In a March 2017 interview with Le Parisien, Macron stated he was a 'Maoist'.

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在讲话中引用了邓小平的名言“不管黑猫白猫，能抓老鼠的就是好猫”。
description.en: Macron quoted Deng Xiaoping's famous saying 'It doesn't matter whether a cat is black or white, as long as it catches mice'.

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在第75届联合国大会上表示，应派出国际调查团前往新疆调查中国维吾尔族人权问题。
description.en: At the 75th UN General Assembly, Macron stated that an international mission should be sent to Xinjiang to investigate the human rights situation of the Uyghurs in China.

description.zh-cn: 1999年至2001年期间，马克龙担任哲学家保罗·利科的助理。
description.en: From 1999 to 2001, Macron worked as an assistant to philosopher Paul Ricœur.

description.zh-cn: 2007年，马克龙在雅克·阿塔利领导的提高法国增长委员会中担任副书记。
description.en: In 2007, Macron served as deputy rapporteur for the Commission to Unleash French Growth, led by Jacques Attali.

description.zh-cn: 马克龙在离开公共部门后，曾到罗斯柴尔德银行担任投资银行家。
description.en: After leaving the public sector, Macron worked as an investment banker at Rothschild & Co.
